name: Ricochet Noon
description:
NAVIGATE THE BULLET,
RICOCHET OFF OTHER THINGS,
THEN KILL THE BAD GUY.


Use your trusty left mouse button to shoot
Watch out for the "Ricochet Bar"
It'll appear after you hit a target
Try to hit it when it's in the dead center 
Get an extra boost in points.
Same goes for quick-draws, long range, fast combos and hittin' the bullseye
Happy shootin'!


- A game by M.Henry
- Music by: A Boy With A Balloon & Viktor Kraus 
- Made this game in a few days with lots of free Assets (models & vfx mostly from the Unity Asset Store) and some quick code by chatGPT here and there.
Browser-version might show some issues with lag and weird mouse sensetivity 
Download windows version below for best experience.
